Contributor: Carrère, P., artist.; H. Chachoin, printer.;
Note: Signed "P. Carrère." Date based on dates of 1st World War. "Visa No. 15.441" appears on the right lower border. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text in French says that monopolies give bad results and should be opposed and liberty should be defended. Liberty of industry, agriculture and of work should be defended. Illustration shows a giant elephant with an octopus on it as well as a train, mailman, soap, and a pipe. The Octopus is labelled state socialism.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I

Title: Les Monopoles
